item.title: Trump Picks Frank Bisignano to Lead Social Security Administration
item.description: Frank Bisignano has spent his career at major Wall Street banks. He has a long history of political giving, mainly to Republicans.

item.title: Kelly Powers, Fox News Commentator Who Shared Her Health Crises With Viewers, Dies at 45
item.description: She was diagnosed with glioblastoma, an aggressive form of brain cancer, in 2020, and used her platform to talk about cancer research.
